issues.description: Page missing main landmark
issues.suggested_fix: Add a <main> element or role='main' attribute to identify the main content area of the page. This helps screen readers navigate to the primary content.

issues.description: Page missing main landmark
issues.suggested_fix: Add a <main> element or role='main' attribute to identify the main content area of the page. This helps screen readers navigate to the primary content.

issues.description: Page missing skip links
issues.suggested_fix: Add skip links at the beginning of the page to allow keyboard users to jump directly to main content, navigation, or other important sections. Example: Skip to main content

issues.description: Page missing skip links for keyboard navigation
issues.suggested_fix: Add skip links at the beginning of the page to allow keyboard users to jump directly to main content, navigation, or other important sections. Example: Skip to main content

issues.description: Page has no heading elements
issues.suggested_fix: Add heading elements (h1, h2, h3, etc.) to structure your content. Start with an h1 that describes the main topic of the page, then use h2, h3, etc. for subsections.

issues.description: Form missing submit button
issues.suggested_fix: Add a submit button (<input type='submit'> or <button type='submit'>) to allow users to submit the form.

additional_info.text: Customer name:Telephone:E-mail address:Pizza SizeSmallMediumLargePizza ToppingsBaconExtra CheeseOnio...

issues.description: Focusable element missing focus indicator: button
issues.suggested_fix: Add a visible focus indicator to this element using CSS (outline, border) or focus-related classes. Users need to see which element has focus.

issues.description: Interactive element is not keyboard focusable: label
issues.suggested_fix: Make this element keyboard focusable by adding tabindex='0' or ensuring it has proper focus management. All interactive elements should be accessible via keyboard navigation.

issues.description: Link text is not descriptive: '1'
issues.suggested_fix: Replace the generic text '1' with more descriptive text that explains where the link goes or what it does. For example, instead of 'Click here', use 'Read our privacy policy' or 'Download the report'.
